title: kaakutsta thilakuDu
sahitya:
kAktstha tilakuDu karuNincakunnADu karuNicumani ceppavE





caraNam 1



 hA kaTAkSa vihInuDi taDani erugaka pOtinakaTA 

EkaraNi dariyintu nApada lIkaraNi kaThinAtmuDaitE 

   



caraNam 2



 mIralE gatiyanucu dinamE mArakanu nuti jEyasAgina 

sArasAkSuDa sArasAkSuDairayambuna jUDa dalapaDu

   



caraNam 3



 dIna rakSakuDitaDani yala dEvatalu goluturani vininE 

bUni kolcina phalamugaNTini pUjyamuga sarivAri lOpala

   



caraNam 4



 EdapaTTalu peTTa dalacina mOTakAputalambukaivaDi 

mETi doreyani bUni kolcina bUTavaDi rakSimpaDAyenu

   



caraNam 5



 dasharatAtmaju dharma guNamula dharma yuktamulai velingenu 

vashamugAdI bAdhalOrvaga vAsudEvuni pAdamAna

   



caraNam 6



dikkumAlina janulakellanu dikku nEnani sakala dikkula 

nekkonaga danakIrti makkuva dakkinADagu dikku jUDaDu

   



caraNam 7



 daNDa dharuDai dAnavu kaDikaNDaluga khaNDincadagayA 

khaNDalAdula brOcu hariyuddaNDuDai iTu jUDaDAyenu

   



caraNam 8



 kuNDalEndra shayAnuDE gati maNDalEndrula kolvulOdama 

daNDa kOrinavAri brOvaka yuNDagAdavaunaDamma

   



caraNam 9



 bhadra shaila nivAsuDaDu tama bhaktavaryula bAdhalupaDu 

rudra vihituNDaguTa nApai krOdhamE sAdhincenamma
